[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 477,000 reported in the network role http://hrvatskapostanska.com/xbrl/2021/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 477,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://hrvatskapostanska.com/xbrl/2021/roles/IzvjesceOPromjenamaKapitala. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : HRK Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900D5G4V6THXC5P79/2021-12-31/ESEF/HR/0/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr.zip/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr/reports/hrvatskapostanska-2021-12-31-hr.xhtml 8323
